info.title: mp API Documentation
info.description:
Welcome to the Knawat MP documentation. Navigate through the documentation to learn more. If you encounter any problems when using our APIs, send us an email it@knawat.com;

## What is Knawat?

Knawat is a Drop-Shipping platform. We are bringing hundreds of thousands of products to let you list in your e-commerce store. We also do all operations behind the e-commerce, so once you receive an order, we will ship it to your customer with your invoice.

## What is Knawat MP API?

Knawat MP APIs mainly for e-commerce stores, allows you to aggregate products to your store, update stock and prices, and send us your orders.

## Support and Chat

We are happy to receive your questions. click here to [chat with us](https://gitter.im/Knawat/Lobby)

UnauthorizedErrorToken.description: Access token is missing or invalid, request new one

UnauthorizedErrorBasic.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

basicAuth.description: Knawat provide extra endpoints for enterprise subscriptions, check pricing here.

Error.description: This general error structure is used throughout this API.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes are two-letter country codes

invoice_url.description: Optional invoice to print with the order

shipping.address_1: Halaskargazi Mahallesi, D10 KAT5 Cd, Rumeli Cd. 35-37

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes are two-letter country codes

invoice_url.description: Optional invoice to print with the order

code.example: 1102 => This items are out of stock
1101 => The products you ordered is not in-stock, The order has not been created!

shipping.address_1: Halaskargazi Mahallesi, D10 KAT5 Cd, Rumeli Cd. 35-37

coupon.description: This field is returned with the response added when a coupon is applied to the membership

originalDiscount.description: This field is only returned with the response when a coupon is applied to the membership

reference.description: External reference ID for third party applications

external_data.description: Free object to save external IDs, token ... etc

internal_data.description: Free object to save OMS references

users.description: At least one owner should be there in the array

city.description: City or Status, one of them is required

state.description: City or Status, one of them is required

code.example: 100 =>  Informational status response code indicates that everything so far is OK and that the client should continue with the request or ignore it if it is already finished.

Product.description: An object that represents a Product.

archive.description: true if the product out of stock

externalUrl.description: Product URL in the customer store, it's only there if the product already pushed

externalId.description: Product ID in the customer store, it's only there if the product already pushed

images.description: List of images links from Knawat CDN servers

tax_class.description: The name of the tax class, it maybe come as number.

attributes.description: Any other information about this product, materials, gender … etc

description.en: Description here is optional, and maybe contain HTML code
description.tr: Description here is optional, and maybe contain HTML code

externalId.description: Product variation ID in the customer store, it's only there if the product already pushed

cost_price.description: Your cost, Knawat sale product with this price

sale_price.description: This is the listed price on your store

market_price.description: Price before the discount, som times known as Compare at or Strike Through price

I18nString.description: Key and value depend on available language(s) and selected language from store settings

get.description: Gets currency code, name and rate
Get all currencies with names, code and rates info
To get all the order info you could use get order by id end-point

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Size of the page to retrieve.

post.description: This service available for some Enterprise subscriptions Only

bank_charges.description: Account id should provide id for account with type bank

get.summary: Get All Shipment Policies or Get By Id

schema.description: Coupon code to be applied to the membership discount

reference.description: External reference ID could be used for payments integration

postpaid.description: Used when the subscription is paid through a third party

grantTo.description: This field is used to donor the subscription to another store

get.description: Retrieve single product information by Product SKU. product should be under this store

delete.description: Delete Product by Product SKU from store. product should be under this store

put.description: Update imported product External IDs by SKU

get.description: Retrieve imported products, sorted by create date DESC

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Size of the page to retrieve.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of the page to retrieve.

parameters.name: lastupdate
parameters.description: Timestamp(seconds since Jan 01 1970. (UTC)) of last import run DateTime (must be in UTC), API will respond only products which are updated/created after this timestamp.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Full text search in sku field

parameters.name: hideOutOfStock
parameters.example: 1 => Hide archived products else will not hide

get.description: Get all categories related to my products.
